name: iii
description:
iii is a little "catroidvania" about a one-eyed cat leaving his comfort zone. Explore underground caverns, gain vision of other dimensions, help the inhabitants, and expand your horizons.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 38 (Jam), iii was a weird take on the theme "A Small World". I built the world so it would be quite small at first, but as the player progresses, they discover more and more.
